Articles.Content: i need to take a picture of my ship in action
You can either get a software for that (Liek Fraps/camstudio/hypercam) or press Ctrl-Prt Scr (Control-Printscreen.

If you go on all programmes/accessories there's a thing called 'snipping tool'. You can also take a screenshot with that and save it. (you'd have to leave Kerbal up though while you get it up so it won't really be able to do launches)

The F1 key will take a screenshot and place it in the \Screenshots\ folder under the game folder.

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky
I run the game from Steam so I use the Steam screenshot feature.
Press the F1 key. The screenshot will be saved in the screenshots subdir in the KSP program dir.
